misconfigurations.scenario: user wants to remove or update inactive tasks
misconfigurations.alert_criteria: ecs task definition set to inactive status

misconfigurations.scenario: user wants to increase the performance of their ecs service(s)
misconfigurations.alert_criteria: if max memory utilization is > 50% for more than 3 concecutive time periods AND autoscaling is not enabled
misconfigurations.recommendation_action: enable autoscalling policy with target tracking; set target to 50%

misconfigurations.scenario: user wants to make sure their services are all running the latest platform version
misconfigurations.recommendation_action: update service in console to LATEST
misconfigurations.recommendation_description_detailed: this will cause the service to automatically rollback to the last stable state

misconfigurations.scenario:
- user wants to increase the reliability of their ecs sevices / tasks and/or
- user has been experiencing frequent service failures and/or
- users' ecs services have been failing health checks
misconfigurations.alert_criteria:
- fargate launch type and/or
- tasks have transitioned to a failed state > 3 times in the last 21 day and/or 
- are failing healthchecks
misconfigurations.recommendation_description_detailed: this will cause the service to automatically rollback to the last stable state
